stories.text:
Hacker news is where most hackers think to go when a service they use is down.

Earlier today hackernews was down for a short period, leaving the million dollar question, where do you go when hacker news is down?
stories.title: Ask HN: Where am I suppose to go when Hacker News is down

stories.text:
After many hours debugging our build system to get notarizing working, Apple finally admits their API is down. We're trying to get a hot-fix out of the door, I guess that's not happening.

Maybe a fun exercise for HackerNews: I you were given the chance to redesign the notarization system of MacOS, what would it look like?

Status page: https://developer.apple.com/system-status/
stories.title: Apple's Notary API Down Again
